description:
Are you sick of constantly nagging your kids?  Let Auto Nagger 5000 nag for you!

Select up to 5 different nags, select a repeat interval for the nags, turn up your volume, and go about your business.  Auto Nagger 5000 will automatically play your selected nags every 1 to 10 minutes.  The nags in this version are pre-set to "Stop hitting each other", "Chew with your mouth closed", "Clean your room", "Eat your vegetables", and "Do your chores".

Plans for future versions include recording your own nags, and saving settings.  We welcome suggestions for additional features.
versionNote: Version 1.0.1 plays nags as they are enabled as a preview.  This version also adds three new nags "Don't chew your nails", "Be Quiet", and, as a first in a male voice for those nagging Dads, "Cut your hair and get a job".  Keep the suggestions coming.  We're working on recording your own nags in the coming versions.
